name: QUOIN PHARMACEUTICALS, INC.
description: Development and commercialization of therapeutic drug products that treat rare diseases.
sampleDescriptions: Lobbying for continued funding from the government for rare disease research and development, including through the Rare Pediatric Disease Designation and Priority Review Voucher Programs; advocating
